DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether orally ingest oat avenanthramides ( AVA ) oat flour cooky bioavailable human measure plasma urine concentration AVAs potential metabolite ingestion . The blood urine concentration quantify several different time point oat flour cooky consume characterize `` concentration-time profile '' .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Metabolism Avenanthramide : Novel Oat Phytochemical
DOC.criteria: Male female nonobese subject ( 18kg/M2 < BMI < 28kg/M2 ) Age 2045 year ) Sign informed consent form approve UMNIRB Willing avoid oat consumption rigorous physical activity day prior test , consume lowflavonoid diet 1 week prior study Presence GI condition interfere absorption ; Clinically significant endocrine , cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , hepatic , pancreatic , biliary neurologic disorder ; Major trauma surgery within 3 month visit ; Cancer prior 2 year ; Allergic oat product ; Women pregnant lactating ; Smoking ; Drinking alcohol > 5 drinks/week ; Using nutraceuticals ; Blood pressure medication ; NSAID ( > 800 mg ibuprofen/week ) ; Vitamin supplementation ; Anticoagulants hypoglycemic drug ; Oat product consumption day test ; Rigorous physical activity day test ; Consumption highflavonoid diet week prior test .
